author: Ainy Cormac
description:
Artificial Truth by J.M. Lee is a techno-thriller for the twenty-first century and a gripping tale for our own. Discussing the very current possibility of general artificial intelligence, the novel feels prescient, allegorical and, in many ways, very possible.  Artificial Truth follows Minju, a woman who recounts the death of her husband, Kim Ki Chan […]

The post REVIEW: Artificial Truth by J.M. Lee appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Artificial Truth by J.M. Lee
